content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The indicated groove section is aligned with the Y-axis. Hence, we prescribe:

1. High stiffness along the Y-axis.
2. X and Z axes are set to lower stiffness.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 250, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
